items.title: 1 Catchall for general errors
items.subtitle: Miscellaneous errors, such as 'divide by zero' and other impermissible operations.

items.title: 2 Misuse of shell builtins (according to Bash documentation)
items.subtitle: Missing keyword or command, or permission problem.

items.title: 126 Command invoked cannot execute
items.subtitle: Permission problem or command is not an executable (use `chmod +x`).

items.title: 127 Command not found
items.subtitle: Possible problem with $PATH or a typo.

items.title: 128 Invalid Argument to `exit`
items.subtitle: `exit` takes only integer args in the range 0 - 255

items.title: 255 `exit` status out of range`
items.subtitle: `exit` takes only integer args in the range 0 - 255
